text: when this cat found himself in a spot of bother , help was on hand from an unlikely source . as the cat frantically tried to pull a paper cup off its head by wheeling round in circles , a dog trotted on to the scene and came to the rescue . the dog approached the distressed cat and removed the cup with its jaw , setting it free . the cat is shown in the first clip staggering around backwards with the paper cup on its head . the confused cat tries to remove the cup from its head - but is unsuccessfully in its attempts . the dog then approaches the cat , who is still struggling with the paper cup on its head . the dog nears the distressed cat and removs the cup with its jaw , setting it free - before leaving it behind . the two animals then go their separate ways , with the clearly relieved cat the last shot in the clip . more than 100,000 have watched the video since it was uploaded to youtube . the footage left viewers perplexed as the animals put aside their age-old hostilities . one commentator said : ' i love how the cat casually goes back to whatever it was doing like nothing had happened . ' others suggested the dog simply wanted the paper cup .
summary: video shows cat frantically trying to pull a paper cup off its head .   a dog approached and removed the cup from its head with its jaw .   more than 100,000 have watched video since it was uploaded to youtube .
